## Definition Of Done

- [ ] Task or initiative link included (or `N/A` + reason)
- [ ] Validation run (`typecheck:domains`, `typecheck:studio`, tests when applicable)
- [ ] Docs updated (`STATUS` + any impacted artifacts)
- [ ] Migration artifacts updated when relevant (`MIGRATION` and plan docs)
